trends: There have been 53 other sightings in Rochester
There were no other sightings in Rochester on or around July 4th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsJust taking a drive down to the beach and I was on the side road just a block away from the beach I noticed a couple of red lights above me to my left. I assume it was tower lights but I always drive down that road and never saw them before. My sister started saying they are moving and that is when I notice that they was flying over us. First we saw 1 then 2 then 3 and 4. Just following one another perfectly. Like a family of fireballs.
Summary: Fireball like object over the skies
